column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////- Expect the wait to be anywhere from 45 min to an hour if they're already open and the line is starting to wrap along westheimer--there's another wrapping line inside. And everyone takes an eternity to order; almost reminiscent of Dominique Ansel's cronut wait in NYC. Can't fault them for living up to the hype so we cannot blame them for the line
column2: but wish the ordering process is more efficient.
